secText:
Lesson:
1. Experiment with [OBJ:actsec_n271:traveling waves] by canceling out the waves.
2. Experiment with traveling waves by combining waves to [OBJ:actsec_n272:create one massive wave].
3. Describe [OBJ:expsec_n273:wave superposition].
4. Describe [OBJ:expsec_n274:reduced superposition].
5. Describe [OBJ:expsec_n277:traveling and standing waves].
6. Identify the [OBJ:expsec_n278:components] of standing waves.
7. Describe what happens when waves are [OBJ:expsec_n279:reflected].
8. Describe the effect of [OBJ:expsec_n279223:resonance] on waves.
